author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

The code block in the README was not ended, making the rest of the document difficult to read. Also the recipe in the other README had a small mistake. Also updates the trace web viewer documentation.

Also makes the trace web viewer to sort the files for the drop-down menu.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1369

#### PR validation:

The README looks better formatted
title: Fixes to `FWCore/Services` README's
